com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl

Class LocalJobRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl.LocalJobRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobSubmitterService

    public class LocalJobRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobSubmitterService
    Implementation of the Job Submitter service that runs the job locally on the same host.
    Since:
    3.0.0

        Submit the job for appropriate execution based on environment.
        Specified by:
        submitJob in interface JobSubmitterService
        Parameters:
        jobRequest - of job to run
        cluster - The cluster this job should run on
        command - the command to run this job with
        applications - Any applications that are needed to run the command
        memory - The amount of memory (in MB) to use to run the job
        Throws:
        GenieException - if there is an error
